items.title: Project Management Tool
items.description: A comprehensive project management tool designed for agile teams.

items.title: Authentication Service
items.description: Secure authentication service with support for OAuth2 and JWT.

items.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing business metrics.

notes.title: Release Planning
notes.content: We need to plan the next quarterly release. Key features to include: user management, reporting, and integration with third-party services.

notes.title: Architecture Decision Record
notes.content: Decision: Use microservices architecture for the new platform. Rationale: Better scalability, loose coupling, and independent deployment of components.

notes.title: API Documentation Guidelines
notes.content: All APIs should include OpenAPI documentation. Endpoints must be versioned and follow RESTful principles. Authentication requirements should be clearly specified.
